009package Color_Edges;
010
011
012import java.awt.Point;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.io.LogStream;
019import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector;
022import imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters;
023
024/**
025 * This plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images.
026 * @author W. Burger
027 * @version 2014/12/03
028 */
029public class Color_Edges_Canny implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        static {
032                LogStream.redirectSystem();
033        }
034        
035        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
036        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = true;
037        static boolean showBinaryEdges = true;
038        static boolean listEdgeTraces = true;
039        
040        ImagePlus imp = null;
041        
042        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
043                this.imp = imp;
044                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
045        }
046
047        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
048                IJ.log("Running lib " + this.getClass().getName());
049                
050                Parameters params = new Parameters();
051                if (!setParameters(params)) return;
052                
053                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
054                
055                if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
056                        ImageProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
057                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Magnitude sigma=" + params.gSigma, eMag)).show();
058                }
059                
060                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
061                        ImageProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
062                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Orientation sigma=" + params.gSigma, eOrt)).show();
063                }
064                
065                if (showBinaryEdges) {
066                        ImageProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
067                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Binary Edges sigma=" + params.gSigma, eBin)).show();
068                }
069                
070                if(listEdgeTraces) {
071                        List<List<Point>> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
072                        IJ.log("number of edge traces: " + edgeTraces.size());
073                }
074        }
075
076        boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
077                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Canny Detector");
078                // Canny parameters:
079                gd.addNumericField("Sigma (0.5 - 20)", params.gSigma, 1);
080                gd.addNumericField("Low Threshold", params.loThr, 2);
081                gd.addNumericField("High Threshold", params.hiThr, 2);
082                gd.addCheckbox("Normalize gradient magnitude", params.normGradMag);
083                // plugin parameters:
084                gd.addMessage("Plugin parameters:");
085                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
086                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation); 
087                gd.addCheckbox("Show binary edges", showBinaryEdges);
088                gd.addCheckbox("List edge traces", listEdgeTraces);
089                // display
090                gd.showDialog();
091                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
092                        return false;
093                }       
094                // update Canny parameters:
095                params.gSigma = (float) gd.getNextNumber();
096                if (params.gSigma < 0.5f) params.gSigma = 0.5f;
097                if (params.gSigma > 20) params.gSigma = 20;
098                params.loThr = (float) gd.getNextNumber();
099                params.hiThr = (float) gd.getNextNumber();
100                params.normGradMag = gd.getNextBoolean();
101                // update plugin parameters:
102                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
103                showEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
104                showBinaryEdges = gd.getNextBoolean();
105                listEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
106                return true;
107        }
108        
109}
